thread.section_title: Gamecheap Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gamecheap | gamecheap.net | 10 of 69
thread.title: Mark Albertson

author: Mark Albertson
title: Mark Albertson
text:
Purchase was straightforward and easy.
Did have issue implementing and had to contact support for assistance.
Was provided with directions for contacting Microsoft in order to obtain a special ID necessary to unlock the license which the system said was already in use.
MS helped with generating the necessary unlock code after which I had a working system.
